d1_text:
Npc0112:
ï¿½Hello... and you are...?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Say, have you ever suffered from some type of sickness or condition[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that you couldn't get cured at a hospital?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½For example, being ï¿½Diamondized,ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½where your head gets as hard as a diamond...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Or... ï¿½Mushroomized,ï¿½ where you have a mushroom on your head...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you're ever stuck with these types of embarrassing conditions,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½we of the magic healing shrine are here to ease your pain.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½We're ready and waiting...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½in the lobby of hospitals all over the world.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The person next to me is the great teacher of magic healing.[HALT][END]
